mapper.sql: m_id, fullname, gender, dob, age, martialstatus, education, address, state, country, phone, company_email, datehired, dateresign, attachment, img_user, deptno, titleno, s_id, b_id, resign_id
mapper.select: select manager.m_id, manager.fullname, manager.gender, manager.dob, manager.age, manager.martialstatus, manager.education, manager.address, manager.state, manager.country, manager.phone, manager.company_email, manager.datehired, manager.dateresign, manager.attachment, manager.img_user, manager.deptno, manager.titleno, manager.s_id, manager.b_id, manager.resign_id, department.deptname, title.titlename from manager inner join department on manager.deptno=department.deptno inner join title on manager.titleno=title.titleno

select manager.m_id, manager.fullname, manager.gender, manager.dob, manager.age, manager.martialstatus, manager.education, manager.address, manager.state, manager.country, manager.phone, manager.company_email, manager.datehired, manager.dateresign, manager.attachment, manager.img_user, manager.deptno, manager.titleno, manager.s_id, manager.b_id, manager.resign_id, department.deptname, title.titlename, salary.monthlysalary, salary.annualsalary, salary.dateupdate, banking_info.bankname, banking_info.accountnum, banking_info.incometaxno, banking_info.epfno from manager inner join department on manager.deptno=department.deptno inner join title on manager.titleno=title.titleno left join salary on manager.s_id=salary.s_id left join banking_info on manager.b_id=banking_info.b_id where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

m_id, fullname, gender, dob, age, martialstatus, education, address, state, country, phone, company_email, datehired, dateresign, attachment, img_user, deptno, titleno, s_id, b_id, resign_id from manager where resign_id = #{resignId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.update:
update manager
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dob = #{dob,jdbcType=DATE},
age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
martialstatus = #{martialstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_email = #{companyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datehired = #{datehired,jdbcType=DATE},
dateresign = #{dateresign,jdbcType=DATE},
attachment = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_user = #{imgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptno = #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER},

s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_id = #{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resign_id = #{resignId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update manager set fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dob = #{dob,jdbcType=DATE}, age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, martialstatus = #{martialstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_email = #{companyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datehired = #{datehired,jdbcType=DATE}, dateresign = #{dateresign,jdbcType=DATE}, attachment = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_user = #{imgUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptno = #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, titleno = #{titleno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_id = #{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resign_id = #{resignId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
